letters.description: Establish a physiological foundation of safety and stabilize the autonomic nervous system.
Shift the client's focus from cognitive narratives to internal felt sensations and somatic presence.
Identify specific areas of somatic holding, tension, or stored energetic blocks within the body.
Utilize titration and pendulation to gently invite stored trauma to surface for processing.
Facilitate the discharge of trapped survival energy through movement, breath, or vocalization.
Allow the nervous system to recalibrate and return to a state of calm homeostasis and rest.
Integrate the release into a new sense of self-agency and an expanded window of tolerance.
